channel.title: Violent-Pkz | 27/7 vps hosted | eco | In top 45 on Rlocus | nex sets |
channel.description:
Violent-Pkz is an amazing 'Top Of The Line' 317 server loading revision 602 npcs and 508 items. An extremely good server. With amazing economy with really good pvp and pvm. Outstanding pk system with pk level. All skill working with perfect exp rates.
Webclient: http://www.violentpkz.com/webclient.html
Download Desktop client: http://www.mediafire.com/?9f0itqmh8qv8zma
Or Download it here: http://dl.dropbox.com/u/152266504/Run%20Violent-pkz.jar
Website: http://www.violent-pkz.com
Forums: http://violent-pkz.2morpg.com/
Rne Locus link: http://www.( R LOCUS).com/toplist/details-26879-ViolentPkz.html
Currently no working webclient work on it as hard as i can.
Server includes:
fully working jad God wars bosses All nex sets vestas, statius Perfect specials Zombies minigame pk points system pk leveling system dungoneering All working skills AND SO MUCH MORE
Join Us Today
